verses.name: Jeremiah 14:10
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord unto this people, Thus have they loved to wander, they have not refrained their feet, therefore the Lord doth not accept them; he will now remember their iniquity, and visit their sins.

verses.name: Jeremiah 14:11
verses.text: Then said the Lord unto me, Pray not for this people for their good.

verses.name: Jeremiah 14:12
verses.text: When they fast, I will not hear their cry; and when they offer burnt offering and an oblation, I will not accept them: but I will consume them by the sword, and by the famine, and by the pestilence.
